decision to move to the cloud with AWS
the richness in terms of features and
services that they have they do listen
to clients they don't listen to partners
and they will always come to our aid
when we need them my name is Nicholas
tan and I'm the senior solutions manager
at fusion X international fusion x-ray
data management player dealing and
focusing in big data analytics and
business insights we help customers
understand their business more are using
the data that they have to help them
reduce costs increase revenue and help
the business overall initially at fusion
X most of our solutions were on-premise
solutions and with on-premise solutions
we had to maintain and manage hardware
and infrastructure our team was always
bogged down in administrating and
managing this infrastructure and doing
repetitive redundant work day on day out
it would take us at least anywhere from
two to three months to actually roll up
an implementation to one customer that
was simply not acceptable by moving to
the cloud we managed to cut that by a
huge margin we are basically rolling out
each customer in about about a week one
of the most significant improvements
that we see is the use of human resource
when we were running on premise we had
IT support staff we had IT
administrators running around managing
supporting servers making sure the
service our online spatch secure for
that instance running a central
reservation system we are connected to
payment gateways and we needed to make
sure that our infrastructure was
constantly PCI DSS compliant with AWS we
don't have to worry about all those
because AWS itself is PCI DSS certified
and with that our team now actually
focused their energy to improve and
innovate not only the platform but the
solution and thus giving us the ability
to offer those innovations to our
clients and making our central
reservations or even our solutions in
general more innovative and more
competitive in the marketplace when we
started off with AWS we use a lot of ec2
instances we got the thing that there
should be a much more better way to
optimize our solutions so we started
talking to the
as technical teams and the solution
architects and we started employing
auto-scaling technology built into our
products we also use RDS as our database
platform so when we have peak periods
for hospitality bookings we could very
easily scale things up we use a lot of
s3 as well by putting content on a story
rather on the databases we have managed
to save substantially on our operating
costs and we have used that operating
cost to reinvest in our clients to
actually help them increase recruitment
for example in our loyalty platform a
simple example is a fashion house that
we have worked with we managed to
actually achieve a hundred thousand
members in seven and a half months
instead of the twelve months that they
expected us to deliver so for fusion X
our partnership with AWS has been
greatly beneficial to us not only from a
business sense but also to our resources
our people the team at AWS has been very
very supportive and has been greatly
greatly influential in terms of how we
actually built our business the tips and
